name: Swaps and Stones
description:
In this classic tile slider game with a twist you must puzzle your way through all 15 levels. Using a powerful ability to change your environment you must use spacial reasoning to collect the keys and reach the end.  Play as a alive stone who want to see the sunlight, make it out of the cave to fulfill this dream!

Controls:

W,A,S,D or ARROW KEYS to move

SPACE to swap

R to reset level

ESC or TAB to quit to menu

Download recommend:

- Save best scores

- far better audio

- looks better

- runs better

Credits:

Asset pack used from Vexed on itch.io

CRT effect from perons on itch.io

Font from Tiny Worlds on itch.io
